content.p: NLog is an open source software, so the source code is available to public and everyone can join the project to improve it. Contact Jarek to get Subversion access.
NLog uses Subversion 1.0 (http://subversion.tigris.org) as its version control system. We recommend a very good Win32 Subversion client called TortoiseSVN.
You can grab the latest sources of the library and supporting tools at: http://svn.sav.net/repos/nlog/trunk/NLog.
